title: October is Juvenile Justice Awareness MonthIN: POLICY (10/16/15) (Afterschool Alliance)
text: ( Source : Afterschool Alliance ) This year, President Obama issued an official proclamation establishing October 2015 as National Youth Justice Awareness Month. Meanwhile , efforts to improve juvenile justice continued on Capitol Hill last
